abstract: Hershey is working with JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America to raise at least $10 billion for a bid, people briefed on the matter said.
snippet: Hershey is working with JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America to raise at least $10 billion for a bid, people briefed on the matter said.
lead_paragraph: Hershey edged closer to a bid for Cadbury of Britain on Friday, people briefed on the matter said. The move comes just days before Kraft is set to disclose its final offer for the confectioner.

headline.main: Hershey Said to Be Closer to an Offer for Cadbury
headline.print_headline: Hershey Said to Be Closer To an Offer for Cadbury

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced
